name: sandboxed_shell
description: Execute shell commands within a secure sandbox. This tool must **ALWAYS** be used instead of direct shell invocation. Synchronous execution is default and recommended for tasks completing in less than about 10 seconds.

custom.default: Shell command running in sandbox. Synchronous by default.

subcommand.name: default
subcommand.description: Execute a shell command using bash in a sandbox

positional_args.name: command
positional_args.description: The shell command to execute (supports pipes, redirects, variables, etc.)
